action.des: Pitching Change: Atahualpa Severino replaces Shae Simmons.

atbat.des: Chris Snyder singles on a ground ball to shortstop Elmer Reyes.
atbat.des_es: Chris Snyder pega sencillo con rodado a campo corto Elmer Reyes.

atbat.des: Brian Goodwin grounds into a double play, second baseman Ramiro Pena to shortstop Elmer Reyes to first baseman Ernesto Mejia. Chris Snyder out at 2nd.

atbat.des: Tommy La Stella grounds out, second baseman Mike Fontenot to first baseman Matt Skole.

atbat.des: Matt Lipka singles on a ground ball to right fielder Michael Taylor.

action.des: With Jose Constanza batting, Matt Lipka steals (1) 2nd base, . Matt Lipka advances to 3rd, on a throwing error by catcher Sandy Leon.
